SELECT w.id AS id, w.workflow_name AS workflowName, w.workflow_desc AS workflowDesc, IFNULL((SELECT ws.`run_status` FROM `t_workflow_run_status` ws WHERE ws.`workflow_id` = w.`id` AND ws.`workflow_edit_version` = w.`edit_version` ORDER BY ws.`id` DESC LIMIT 1) , 0) AS runStatus, w.create_time AS createTime, u.user_name AS userName FROM t_workflow w INNER JOIN t_user u ON w.user_id = u.id WHERE w.project_id = #{projectId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND w.status = 1 AND u.status = 1
and w.workflow_name like concat('%',#{workflowName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY w.create_time DESC

SELECT w.`id` AS id, w.`edit_version` AS editVersion, IFNULL((SELECT ws.`run_status` FROM `t_workflow_run_status` ws WHERE ws.`workflow_id` = w.`id` AND ws.`workflow_edit_version` = w.`edit_version` ORDER BY ws.`id` DESC LIMIT 1) , 0) AS runStatus, IFNULL((SELECT ws.`cancel_status` FROM `t_workflow_run_status` ws WHERE ws.`workflow_id` = w.`id` AND ws.`workflow_edit_version` = w.`edit_version` ORDER BY ws.`id` DESC LIMIT 1) , 0) AS cancelStatus, (SELECT ws.`id` FROM `t_workflow_run_status` ws WHERE ws.`workflow_id` = w.`id` AND ws.`workflow_edit_version` = w.`edit_version` ORDER BY ws.`id` DESC LIMIT 1) AS workflowRunStatusId, w.project_id AS projectId FROM `t_workflow` w WHERE w.`id` = #{workflowId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND w.`status` = 1

SELECT w.`id` AS id, twrs.workflow_edit_version AS editVersion, twrs.run_status AS runStatus, twrs.cancel_status AS cancelStatus, twrs.id AS workflowRunStatusId, w.project_id AS projectId FROM `t_workflow` w JOIN t_workflow_run_status twrs on w.id = twrs.workflow_id WHERE twrs.`id` = #{workflowRunStatusId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
